document.full_text: general electric co  reached a $3.2 billion cash deal to acquire a french maker of high-efficiency motors used in the oil and gas sector, pouring more money into its most profitable division.
document.title: ge moves deeper into energy with $3.2 billion deal
lines_and_colors: general electric co  reached a $3.2 billion cash deal to acquire a french maker of high-efficiency motors used in the oil and gas sector, pouring more money into its most profitable division.
